Niek van Dam

Excellence (Delta) Student, Software Developer, HBO-ICT Fontys Eindhoven

Resume

About Me

My name is Niek van Dam, I am a 19-year-old student from the FHICT Excellence course studying the software trajectory.

Before starting my study at Fontys, I studied software engineering on a vocational level for 3 years, where we created responsive web apps. During this study my teachers let me take a deeper dive into algorithms and design patterns, after which I got interested in software engineering.

I started my dive into artificial intelligence half a year ago, and have been working on several small projects in order to master this skill. Besides AI, mastering mathematics and data science are also on the list. Next to programming programming, I am also interested in trading on the stock market and crypto markets. I have been trading on the crypto market for about two years now, and the stock market for a few months. My goal is to create a trading algorithm - if possible with neural networking - that will automate most of the trades for me once I have enough knowledge of AI

Experience

Damen Schelde Naval Shipbuilding (DSNS)

Intern software developer - August 2018 - January 2019

During my internship I wrote a closed-source calculation tool which was responsible for estimating the paint used per ship, based on an excel sheet. It could create basic paint schemes, export paint data to excel and recommend paint schemes in certain rooms

  • The tool had broad usage within the company.
  • My first ever project with C# & Entity Framework.
c# asp.net EF Devops Office Interop Azure

Gemeente Veere

Software Developer - March 2019 - May 2019

I was tasked with creating a small tool which gave insight into the tracking of assets (iPads, laptops, phones) within the city hall, so that system administrators had a general idea of who was using what asset.

  • Project made for city hall.
c# wpf SQL devops

Grendel Games

Front end developer - March 2019

I got asked by a friend to help with a project for the Atlassian Codegeist Hackaton in the team for GrendelGames. The goal was to create an addon in which gamified the progress per sprint. More information can be found here

  • Reached the honorable mentions.
  • Ended up 6th in the hackaton.
  • 1350 participants.
Typescript wpf SQL devops

Education / Training

Fontys University of Applied Sciences

Software engineering - August 2019 - July 2023

Studying a bachelors in software engineering at Fontys. In my second semester I got elected to parttake in the Excellence (Delta) trajectory, which I am studying right now. I am currently studying a specialization in Artificial Intelligence, where we are taught the basics of AI.
  • 4 year bachelors study.
  • Specialization course in AI.
  • Elected for Excellence program.

Coursera

Machine learning - September 2020

After working on some AI projects in the previous semester, I decided I had to increase my knowledge of Artificial Intelligence, in order to create better prototypes and deliveries per sprint. I am still working on this course, and am planning to have it done within the coming few months.
  • Linear regression.
  • Regularization.
  • Unsupervised learning.
  • Anomaly detection.

Scalda college voor Techniek en Design

Software engineering - August 2016 - July 2019

At the time I was studying at Scalda, the course Software engineering was not that developed and relatively new, mostly working in project-based solutions. We were taught how to create basic OOP/CRUD applications in Java, as well as basics on how to apply MVC.
  • Head of the course's event committee.
  • Deepening in design patterns and other languages.
  • Usage of scrum in projects.

Digital Excellence

A lot of employees and students of Fontys School of ICT (FHICT) create a lot of nice products. As a hobby, for their work or because of a school project. These can be software solutions, small scripts, research papers, thesis but possibly also project ideas and proposals for others to pick up. Unfortunately, most of them remain private and are not known by the majority of the population. The goal of the DeX-platform (short: DeX) is to make all this work more findable and thus improving collaboration.

angular typescript C# EFcore
